data.title: The Penguins of Madagascar videography
data.meta_description: Home video releases of The Penguins of Madagascar. Please note, this does not include home video releases of the movie of the same name, which Nickelodeon was not involved with.
data.text:
Cover Title Released The Penguins of Madagascar February 2, 2009 Episodes:

"Popcorn Panic"

"Gone in a Flash"

This DVD was released as part of a 2-pack with the original DVD release of Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa.

Operation: DVD Premiere February 9, 2010 Episodes:

"Truth Ache"

"Command Crisis"

"Go Fish"

"Roomies"

"Needle Point"

"Launchtime"

"All Choked Up"

"The Hidden"

"Tangled in the Web"

Bonus feature: DreamWorks Animation Video Jukebox

Happy King Julien Day! August 10, 2010 Episodes:

"Happy King Julien Day!"

"Assault & Batteries"

"Kingdom Come"

"Operation: Plush & Cover"

"Crown Fools"

"Jungle Law"

"The Helmet"

"All King, No Kingdom"

New To The Zoo August 10, 2010 Episodes:

"In the Line of Doody"

"The Big Squeeze"

"Out of the Groove"

"Skorca!"

"The Red Squirrel"

"Jiggles"

"Untouchable"

"Cat's Cradle"

I Was a Penguin Zombie October 5, 2010 Episodes:

"I Was a Penguin Zombie"

"Driven to the Brink"

"Haunted Habitat"

"Lemur See, Lemur Do"

"Eclipsed"

"Mort Unbound"

"Misfortune Cookie"

"It's About Time"

The All-Nighter Before Xmas October 11, 2011 Episodes:

"The All Nighter Before Christmas"

"The Lost Treasure of the Golden Squirrel"

"The Hoboken Surprise"

"Miracle on Ice"

"Wishful Thinking"

"Operation: Good Deed"

Operation: Blowhole January 10, 2012 Episodes:

"Dr. Blowhole's Revenge"

"The Return of the Revenge of Dr. Blowhole"

Operation: Get Ducky February 14, 2012 Episodes:

"Paternal Egg-Stinct"

"Hard Boiled Eggy"

"April Fools"

"Siege the Day"

"Operation: Neighbor Swap"

"Otter Gone Wild"

"Two Feet High and Rising"

"Sting Operation"

Operation: Antarctica October 30, 2012 Episodes:

"Operation Antartica"

"The Falcon & The Snow Job"

"Penguiner Takes All"

"Roger Dodger"

"Snakehead!"

"Concrete Jungle Survival"

"Work Order"

Operation: Special Delivery November 4, 2014
